## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATPLT5, ATPMT5, PMT5</u>
- **Gene Name:** POLYOL TRANSPORTER 5, ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA POLYOL/MONOSACCHARIDE TRANSPORTER 5, polyol/monosaccharide transporter 5
- **Description:**   polyol/monosaccharide transporter 5;(source:Araport11)
